author: Universal Pictures
description:
After guiding her family to safety, Grandma Omi (Krista Stadler) stays behind to confront the demon Krampus, who emerges menacingly from the chimney, face-to-face.

Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Krampus-Adam-Scott/dp/B01DYZMSW0
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/krampus/id1056377194

Fandango Now: https://www.fandangonow.com/details/movie/krampus-2015/MMV582D4474CFFA49422D6755406BC36C1CA
VUDU: https://www.vudu.com/content/movies/details/Krampus/730515
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: https://www.uphe.com/movies/krampus

When his dysfunctional family clashes over the holidays, young Max is disillusioned and turns his back on Christmas. Little does he know, this lack of festive spirit has unleashed the wrath of Krampus: a demonic force of ancient evil intent on punishing non-believers. All hell breaks loose
title: Krampus | The Legend Confronts The Demon
